metadata.title: CVE-2021-47466 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mm, slub: fix potential memoryleak in kmem_cache_open()In error path, the random_seq of slub cache might be leaked.  Fix thisby using __kmem_cache_release() to release all the relevant resources.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
